Reviews.Content: easy main road arrived sunday afternoon weeks stay maui aloha confronted unwelcoming welcome hotel â€“ xyz sunday receptionist outrigger aina nalu graduated honours school disinterested unhelpful unfriendly map complex rapidly circled various facilities services missed couple repeat folded map passed scowl told temerity enquire garden view booked â€“ â€œall garden view spat returned instructed â€˜the access codes complementary wifi pool response â€œwhat explained stated wifi pool reception access codes iâ€™m glad garden view consisted row palms separating sitting bedrooms courtyard little dark enormous kitted â€“ sitting bedroom utility showerroom clean appointed complex set kept gardens pools facilities free wifi hotspots towards lahaina means hustle bustle main drag minute walk front street harbour parking charges yes steep irritating parking isnt easy busy narrow streets price pay didnt charge doubt rates rise stay explore maui rating reflects intermittent quality reception xyz premises left usual surly irritated inconvenience self pity edge otherwise enjoyable stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Choice to stay in Lahaina”
Reviews.Author: PanikFamily
Reviews.Content: location perfect looking enjoy feel town lahaina offer close shopping centers importantly close front street beach waterfront clean layouts lots living space kitchen space beautiful bathrooms functional washer dryer unit pools placed nicely decorated perfect location couple single family choice

Reviews.Title: “Perfect stay on Maui”
Reviews.Author: boxboy12
Reviews.Content: family looking stayed bedroom bathroom unit washerdryer handy kitchen perfect adequate air conditioned location front street convienient complaint price pay parking little parking street aina nalu allow day aina nalu add price cost dont feel getting ripped issue resort trip pools uncrowded grounds beautiful

Reviews.Title: “The location was great, rooms very clean but the parking situation....”
Reviews.Author: chillydown27
Reviews.Content: wonderful time maui amazing money location perfect walking distance town harbor bummer hotel parking situation charge 15 day park lot tons space luckily found parking space street day 2 weeks housekeepers nice knock day 830am king queen sized bed probably stay outrigger 2 week stay nice kitchen washer dryer

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: travelerRegina
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel week originally booked 2 days returning 4 condition excellent staff friendly helpful pools grounds beautiful hotel located 2 blocks shops ocean easy walk stayed outrigger hotel 1 night hotel 100 times stayed 2 bedroom 1 bedroom units

Reviews.Title: “Great accomodations for the price!”
Reviews.Author: atate1979
Reviews.Content: stay location quiet street lahaina walking distance lot restaurants clean brightly lit sunlight pools relaxing views west maui mountains youre looking beach stay youre looking ritz youre looking quality lay head night price convenient location

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay.”
